items.q: You ____________________ (might / must) pick up Ellie from the bus station on Friday.
Arthur ____________________ (should / can) dance very well.
Tim ____________________ (must / might) go dancing this weekend, but he's not sure he'll have the time.
If you see a tornado coming, you ____________________ (must / might) find shelter immediately.
The exam will be challenging. You ____________________ (can / should) study for it.
If you want, you ____________________ (can / must) borrow my car while yours is being repaired.
You ____________________ (must / might) have your passport with you if you plan to leave the country.
I ____________________ (can / will) call my sister tonight to see how she is feeling.
If you want to learn English, you ____________________ (can / should) practice it as much as possible.
Peter ____________________ (might / must) go to Argentina next summer if he saves enough money.
The teacher gave us three ____________________ (assign / assignments).
I often ____________________ (confuse / confusion) the words "their" and "they're."
Your new haircut looks very ____________________ (attractive / attraction).
She runs three miles a day and swims two miles. She has so much ____________________ (energize / energy).
Do you know how to ____________________ (pronounce / pronunciation) this word?
The Red Sea is a body of water ____________________ is between Africa and Asia.
They give an award to the player ____________________ scores the most points.
The assignment ____________________ our teacher gave us was really difficult!
I voted for the candidate ____________________ was best qualified to be president.
We looked at all the cars ____________________ were on sale.
Which word best completes blank (1)? a. who b. that
Which word best completes blank (2)? a. yesterday b. last
Which word best completes blank (3)? a. who b. that
Which word best completes blank (4)? a. can b. should
Which word best completes blank (5)? a. will b. might
Which word best completes blank (6)? a. who b. that
Which word best completes blank (7)? a. on b. in
Which word best completes blank (8)? a. can b. might
Which word best completes blank (9)? a. who b. that
Which word best completes blank (10)? a. in b. to
The _____ leaves at two o'clock.
The San Diego Zoo has lemurs and other _____ animals.
The company is offering me an excellent _____ and benefits.
We have to write in our _____ every day for English class.
The mountains look like they're close, but they're really very _____.
They usually _____ at least two packages a day.
He's working hard to _____ his grades.
What did you put in this _____? It's so heavy!
You can't park in the business _____ during the day.
She waited until _____ to water the plants, because it was cooler then.
to pack _____
to cause _____
to go _____
to work _____
to make _____
every night / eats dinner / your family / at home / ____________________________________________
Tony and Angie / at the party / will / meet / on Friday ____________________________________________
must / get / by five o'clock / to the airport / we ____________________________________________
should / for / we / next summer / vacation / go to Spain ____________________________________________
must / this paper / finish / before / I / Tuesday ____________________________________________
Skydiving is a dangerous hobby. This hobby is popular. ____________________________________________
Yoga is an ancient exercise. This exercise combines stretching, breathing, and strength training. ____________________________________________
Geoffrey Chaucer was an English author. This author wrote The Canterbury Tales . ____________________________________________
Spaghetti is a delicious food. This food was created in China. ____________________________________________
Pablo Picasso was a well-known artist. Picasso lived in the twentieth century. ____________________________________________
Every spring visit Washington D.C. to see the cherry blossoms.
This is the same movie. That we saw last week.
The man who repaired my refrigerator yesterday only charged me $20.
The second song that he sang was so sad!
We're going to have a party. For the festival that is next week.
Write about a movie that you like. Describe the movie, briefly tell what happens, and explain why you like it.
